rule.assert: Error: MCCI_IN000200UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.extension SHALL NOT have a value. See Table O.1.2-1
Error: The attribute acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to NE. (Don't ack an ack.) See Section O.1.2.
Error: Acknowledgement is a required class. See Section O.1.2.
Error: MCCI_IN000200UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.2-1
Error: MCCI_IN000200UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.2-1
Error: MCCI_IN000200UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.extension SHALL NOT have a value. See Table O.1.2-1
Error: MCCI_IN000200UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.2-1
Error: MCCI_IN000200UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.2-1
Error: MCCI_IN000100UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.extension SHALL NOT have a value. See Table O.1.1-1
Error: MCCI_IN000100UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.1-1
Error: MCCI_IN000100UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.1-1
Error: MCCI_IN000100UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.extension SHALL NOT have a value. See Table O.1.1-1
Error: MCCI_IN000100UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.1-1
Error: MCCI_IN000100UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.1-1
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Accept Ack Code is fixed to 'NE' (Never) as this is an acknowledgment itself. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.extension SHALL NOT have a value. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Device id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.extension SHALL NOT have a value. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: MCCI_IN000300UV01 Organization id. IHE restriction, id.root SHALL be an ISO OID. See Table O.1.3-2
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201301UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201301UV02. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201301UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201301UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to AL. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: There shall be only one receiver device. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201301UV02/controlActProcess/code/@code shall have the trigger event code value PRPA_TE201301UV02. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201301UV02/controlActProcess/subject/registrationEvent/statuscode/@code shall be set to active. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The element replacementOf shall not be present. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The patient and patientPerson have a 1...1 cardinality. See Figure 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: Either Person.name or Patient.id must be non-null. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The patientPerson element shall have a classCode attribute equal to "PSN". See Figure 3.44.4.1.2-1 and Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The patientPerson element shall have a determinerCode attribute equal to "INSTANCE". See Figure 3.44.4.1.2-1 and Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The patientPerson/asOtherIDs/@classCode can be any specialization of "role" except for Citizen or Employee. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201302UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201302UV02. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201302UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201302UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to AL. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: There shall be only one receiver device. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201302UV02/controlActProcess/code/@code shall have the trigger event code value PRPA_TE201302UV02. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201302UV02/controlActProcess/subject/registrationEvent/statuscode/@code shall be set to active. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The element replacementOf shall not be present. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-2.
Error: The patient and patientPerson have a 1...1 cardinality. See Figure 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: Either Person.name or Patient.id must be non-null. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The patientPerson element shall have a classCode attribute equal to "PSN". See Figure 3.44.4.1.2-1 and Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The patientPerson element shall have a determinerCode attribute equal to "INSTANCE". See Figure 3.44.4.1.2-1 and Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The patientPerson/asOtherIDs/@classCode can be any specialization of "role" except for Citizen or Employee. See Table 3.44.4.1.2-1.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201304UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201304UV02. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201304UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201304UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to AL. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The shall be 1 element PRPA_IN201304UV02/receiver. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201304UV02/controlActProcess/code/@code shall have the value PRPA_TE201304UV02. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201304UV02/controlActProcess/subject/registrationEvent/statuscode/@code shall be set to active. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-1.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201304UV02/controlActProcess/subject/registrationEvent/statusCode@code shall be set to active. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The element registrationEvent/replacementOf shall be present. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The attribute for registrationEvent/replacementOf/priorRegistration/statusCode/@code shall be obsolete. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: The element registrationEvent/replacementOf/priorRegistration shall be present. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: There shall be a single priorRegistration role id that represents the subsumed patient identifier. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-3.
Error: Person.name must be non-null. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-1.
Error: Patient.id must be non-null. See Table 3.44.4.2.2-1.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201305UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201305UV02. See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201305UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201305UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to AL. See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: There shall be only one element PRPA_IN201305UV02/receiver/device. See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: The element PRPA_IN201305UV02/controlActProcess/Code shall be present. See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201305UV02/controlActProcess/Code/@code shall have the trigger event code value PRPA_TE201305UV02. See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: The controlActProcess/authorOrPerformer/@typeCode shall be set to "AUT". See Table 3.47.4.1.2-7.
Error: The queryByParameter/responseModalityCode/@code is required and fixed to "R". See Section 3.47.4.1.2.2.
Error: The queryByParameter/responsePriorityCode/@code is required and fixed to "I". See Section 3.47.4.1.2.2.

Warning: According to Table 3.47.4.1.2-7, the atrribute PRPA_IN201305UV02/controlActProcess/@moodCode shall be set to RQO (Request-Order). However, this violates the version of the PRPA_IN201305UV02 schema and HL7 model pointed to by the IHE ITI specification which forces this element to be an EVN (Event). This discrepancy has been documented in a Change Proposal (CP-ITI-455). This warning message may change upon the resolution of that Change Proposal.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201306UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201306UV02. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201306UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201306UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to NE. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: There shall be only one element PRPA_IN201306UV02/receiver/device. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The controlActProcess/@moodCode shall be set to "EVN". See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The element PRPA_IN201306UV02/controlActProcess/Code shall be present. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201306UV02/controlActProcess/Code/@code shall have the trigger event code value PRPA_TE201306UV02. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The controlActProcess/queryAck/queryId shall be present and populated with the query ID to which this message is a response. See Table O.2.2-2.
Error: The controlActProcess/queryAck/resultTotalQuantity shall be present and populated with the appropriate values. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The controlActProcess/queryAck/resultCurrentQuantity shall be present and populated with the appropriate values. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The controlActProcess/queryAck/resultRemainingQuantity shall be present and populated with the appropriate values. See Table 3.47.4.4.2-9.
Error: The patient/statusCode/@code shall be set to active. This value specifies the state of the record in a patient registry. See Table 3.47.4.2.2-8.
Error: Either Person.name or Patient.id must be non-null. See Table 3.47.4.2.2-8.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201309UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201309UV02. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-4.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201309UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-4.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201309UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to AL. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-4.
Error: There shall be 1 element PRPA_IN201309UV/receiver. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-4.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201309UV02/controlActProcess/code/@code shall have the value PRPA_TE201309UV02. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-4.
Error: The element authorOrPerformer/@typeCode shall be set to AUT. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-4.
Error: There shall be exactly one controlActProcess/queryByParameter/parameterList/patientIdentifier element. See Section 3.45.4.1.2.2.
Error: There shall be exactly one controlActProcess/queryByParameter/parameterList/patientIdentifier/value element. See Section 3.45.4.1.2.2.
Error: If one or more DataSource parameters are present, each SHALL contain exactly one DataSource.value parameter See Section 3.45.4.1.2.2.
Error: The attribute controlActProcess/queryByParameter/responsePriorityCode/@code is required and is fixed to "I". See Section 3.45.4.1.2.2.
Error: No continuations necessary for this type of query so QueryByParameter statusCode is always "new". See Table 3.45.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute parameterList/dataSource/value/@extension shall not be present. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute parameterList/dataSource/value/@root shall be present. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-2.
Error: The attribute parameterList/dataSource/value/@root shall be a valid ISO OID. See Table 3.45.4.1.2-2.

Warning: According to table Table 3.45.4.1.2-4, the attribute PRPA_IN201309UV02/controlActProcess/@moodCode shall be set to RQO (Request-Order). However, this violates the version of the PRPA_IN201309UV02 schema and HL7 model pointed to by the IHE ITI specification which forces this element to be an EVN (Event). This discrepancy has been documented in a Change Proposal (CP-ITI-455). This warning message may change upon the resolution of that Change Proposal.
Error: the attribute PRPA_IN201310UV02/interactionId/@extension shall equal PRPA_IN201310UV02. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201310UV02/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201310UV02/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to NE. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: There shall be only one element PRPA_IN201310UV/receiver/device. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201310UV02/controlActProcess/moodCode shall be set EVN. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The element PRPA_IN201310UV02/controlActProcess/code shall be present. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The attribute PRPA_IN201310UV02/controlActProcess/code/@code shall have the value PRPA_TE201310UV02. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The element PRPA_IN201310UV02/controlActProcess/subject/registrationEvent/inFullfilmentOf shall not be present. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: There shall be zero or one element controlActProcess/subject/registrationEvent. See Table 3.45.4.4.2-5.
Error: The patient/providerOrganization/id shall have only a root expressed as an ISO OID matching the id/@root attributes of the element patient. See Section 3.45.4.2.2.1.
Error: The patient/providerOrganization/id shall have only a root expressed as an ISO OID matching the id/@root attributes of the element patient. See Section 3.45.4.2.2.1.
Error: Person.name must be non-null. See Table 3.45.4.2.2-3.
Error: Patient.id must be non-null. See Table 3.45.4.2.2-3.
Error: The attribute QUQI_IN000003UV01/interactionId/@extension shall equal QUQI_IN000003UV01. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: The attribute QUQI_IN000003UV01/processingModeCode/@code shall be set to T. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: The attribute QUQI_IN000003UV01/acceptAckCode/@code shall be set to AL. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: There shall be only one receiver device. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: The QUQI_IN000003UV01/acknowledgement/typeCode/@code SHALL be set to AA. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: The QUQI_IN000003UV01/acknowledgement/targetMessage/id SHALL be the message ID of the immediately preceding Query response message. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: The attribute QUQI_IN000003UV01/controlActProcess/code/@code SHALL have the trigger event code value PRPA_TE000003UV01. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.
Error: The QUQI_IN000003UV01/controlActProcess/queryContinuation/queryId SHALL be set to the original query identifier. See Table 3.47.4.3.2-1.

Error: For Query Control Act Request Continuation/Cancellation Control Act, the statusCode defaults to "waitContinuedQueryResponse". The only other possible value is "aborted", indicating no more results are needed from the query fulfiller. See Table O.2.4-4.

Warning: According to table Table O.2.4-4, the attribute QUQI_IN000003UV01/controlActProcess/@moodCode shall be set to RQO (Request-Order). However, this violates the version of the QUQI_IN000003UV01 schema and HL7 model pointed to by the IHE ITI specification which forces this element to be an EVN (Event). This discrepancy has been documented in a Change Proposal (CP-ITI-455). This warning message may change upon the resolution of that Change Proposal.
